meanings.sent1: The booksellers at the bookstore were friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy visiting the booksellers at the local book fair.
meanings.sent3: The booksellers had a sale on mystery novels, but they couldn't solve the case of the missing bestseller.
meanings.sent4: The booksellers were like literary detectives, uncovering hidden gems for their customers.
meanings.sent5: The booksellers' passion for reading was evident in the way they recommended books to everyone.

meanings.definition: A store or business that sells books.
meanings.sent1: The booksellers in town have a wide selection of books for all ages.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time browsing through the booksellers near my house.
meanings.sent3: The booksellers' shop was so popular that even the characters in the books wanted to visit.
meanings.sent4: The booksellers' store was a treasure trove of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The booksellers' store felt like a magical portal to different worlds through the pages of books.
